languages.text: "Перед тем, как ты будешь утилизирован, тебе разрешено исповедаться. Что сподвигло тебя, бывшего {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} священных залов Деус Механикус, нарушить заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} и превратить свой храм в обитель техноереси?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"
languages.original_text: "Перед тем, как ты будешь утилизирован, тебе разрешено исповедаться. Что сподвигло тебя, бывшего {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} священных залов Деус Механикус, нарушить заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} и превратить свой храм в обитель техноереси?"

traits.locale_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess your sins. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess your sins. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess your sins. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess your sins. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess your sins. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

"Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

languages.text: “在对你进行处理之前，你可以进行忏悔。究竟是什么原因，让你，负责万机之神神圣大厅的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}，背弃了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的信条，把你的神殿变成了科技异端的巢穴？”
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: “在对你进行处理之前，你可以忏悔你的罪过。是什么原因让你，万机之神神圣大厅中的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}，背弃了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的信条，把你的神殿变成了科技异端的巢穴？”

languages.text: «Antes de su eliminación tiene derecho a confesarse. ¿Qué le ha motivado, siendo {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} de los sagrados salones del Deus Mechanicus, para romper los mandamientos del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} y convertir su templo en un antro de tecnoherejía?».
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: «Antes de su eliminación tiene derecho a confesar sus pecados. ¿Qué le ha motivado, siendo {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} de los sagrados salones del Deus Mechanicus, para romper los mandamientos del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} y convertir su templo en un antro de tecnoherejía?».

languages.text: 「処分する前に、告白することを許そう。デウス・メカニクスの神聖なる殿堂の前{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}であるあなたに、何が取り憑いて{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の教義を破り、その寺院を異端技術の巣窟に変えることになったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: 「処分する前に、告白することを許そう。デウス・メカニクスの神聖なる殿堂の前{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}であるあなたに、何が取り憑いて{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の教義を破り、その寺院を異端技術の巣窟に変えることになったのか？」

languages.text: "Bevor Ihr entsorgt werdet, dürft Ihr die Beichte ablegen. Was hat Besitz ergriffen von Euch, einem vormaligen {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} der heiligen Hallen des Deus Mechanicus, dass Ihr die Gebote des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} gebrochen und Euren Tempel in einen Hort der Tech-Ketzerei verwandelt habt?"
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Bevor Ihr entsorgt werdet, könnt Ihr Eure Sünden beichten. Was hat Besitz ergriffen von Euch, einem vormaligen {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} der heiligen Hallen des Deus Mechanicus, dass Ihr die Gebote des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} gebrochen und Euren Tempel in einen Hort der Tech-Ketzerei verwandelt habt?"

languages.text: « Vous avez le droit de vous confesser avant d'être éliminé. Qu'est-ce qui a pu pousser un ancien {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} des saintes salles du Deus Mechanicus à transgresser les préceptes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} et ouvrir son temple à la technohérésie ? »
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez le droit de confesser vos péchés avant d'être éliminé. Qu'est-ce qui a pu pousser un ancien {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} des saintes salles du Deus Mechanicus à transgresser les préceptes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} et ouvrir son temple à la technohérésie ? »

languages.text: "İmhaya tabi tutulmadan önce itirafta bulunmana izin var. Deus Mechanicus'un kutsal salonlarının eski bir {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ü{/g} olarak seni {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} ilkelerini görmezden gelip tapınağını tekno kâfirlik yuvasına dönüştürmeye hangi güç zorladı?"
languages.original_text: "Before you are subjected to disposal, you are allowed to confess. What possessed you, a former {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the hallowed halls of the Deus Mechanicus, to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s tenets and turn your temple into a den of tech-heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "İmhaya tabi tutulmadan önce itirafta bulunmana izin var. Deus Mechanicus'un kutsal salonlarının eski bir {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}'ü olarak seni {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in ilkelerini görmezden gelip tapınağını bir tekno kâfirlik yuvasına dönüştürmeye hangi güç zorladı?"
